title: Service Fields

fields.label: Hero Section
fields.name: hero
fields.instructions: Hero section displayed at the top of the service page

sub_fields.label: Subtitle
sub_fields.name: hero_subtitle
sub_fields.instructions: Small text above the main title (e.g., "VEHICLE WRAPS")

sub_fields.label: Title (Highlighted)
sub_fields.name: hero_title_highlight
sub_fields.instructions: First part of title in teal color (e.g., "Elevate Your Image With")

sub_fields.label: Title (Regular)
sub_fields.name: hero_title
sub_fields.instructions: Second part of title in dark color (e.g., "Branded Workwear")

fields.label: Card Info
fields.name: card
fields.instructions: Information displayed on the services listing page

sub_fields.label: Card Description
sub_fields.name: card_description
sub_fields.instructions: Short description for the service card

fields.label: Benefits Section
fields.name: benefits
fields.instructions: Add up to 3 benefit items with icons

fields.label: Content Sections
fields.name: content_sections
fields.instructions: Add content blocks for the service page

sub_fields.label: Title (Highlighted)
sub_fields.name: title_highlight
sub_fields.instructions: First part of title in teal color (e.g., "We Build")

sub_fields.label: Title (Regular)
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Second part of title in dark color (e.g., "Brands That Move People.")

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions: CTA button text (leave empty to hide button)

sub_fields.label: Title (Highlighted)
sub_fields.name: section_title_highlight
sub_fields.instructions: First part of title in teal color

sub_fields.label: Title (Regular)
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Second part of title in dark/white color

sub_fields.label: Label
sub_fields.name: label
sub_fields.instructions: Small label above the title (e.g. VAN WRAPS)

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions: CTA button text (leave empty to hide button)

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional title above the FAQ (e.g. What's Included in Your Package)

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Image displayed on the right side of the FAQ

fields.label: Gallery
fields.name: gallery
fields.instructions: Add images for the gallery/slider section

fields.label: CTA Section
fields.name: cta
fields.instructions: Call-to-action section at the bottom of the page

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.default_value: Ready to Transform Your Business Look?

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background
sub_fields.instructions: Desktop background image for CTA section

sub_fields.label: Background Image (Mobile)
sub_fields.name: background_mobile
sub_fields.instructions: Mobile background image for CTA section

description: Fields for the Service custom post type
